content: wrap yourself in cozy colourful stripes with the hidden gem blanket there is so much to love about this blanket * it has a fun diamond design * it s crocheted all in one piece with no seams * it uses the moss stitch a combination of single crochets and chain-1 spaces that is both relaxing and addicting * self-striping yarn specifically mandala ombre is used to add bursts of colour to your project without doing any extra work * the blanket changes colours every 2 rounds - this is a trick for minimizing the number of ends you have to weave in at the end of the project > the free pattern for the baby blanket size 36 x 44 can be found ** here 1 ** > buy 2 patterns get 1 free with coupon code freepattern add all 3 patterns to your cart and use the coupon code discount will be applied at checkout skill level intermediate language english crochet terminology us terms stitches chain single_crochet reverse single_crochet border - optional sizes the free pattern is for a baby blanket - 36 x 44 the pdf includes 4 blanket sizes along with instructions to create a custom-sized blanket 1 baby - 36 x 44 2 lapghan - 41 x 50 3 small throw - 52 x 65 4 large throw - 70 x 85 other details * 5 5mm crochet hook needed * medium 4 worsted weight yarn is used for this design * pattern has been tech edited * the pdf includes step-by-step pictures * the printable pdf is a total of 19 pages i hope you enjoy making and using your blanket s 1 https //thispixiecreates com/moss-stitch-diamond-baby-blanket/
